select #{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.store_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.inv_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.end_amount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.end_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.end_sale_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.begin_amount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.begin_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.begin_sale_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.in_amount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.in_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.in_sale_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.out_amount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.out_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.out_sale_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.y_in_amount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.y_in_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.y_in_sale_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.y_out_amount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.y_out_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.y_out_sale_money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.remove_zero_error,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.sale_zero_error,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.location_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} from dual

UPDATE mat_inv_balance
end_amount = #{item.end_amount,jdbcType=FLOAT},

WHERE group_id = #{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hos_id = #{item.hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND copy_code = #{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND year = #{item.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND month = #{item.month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND store_id = #{item.store_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND inv_id = #{item.inv_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND location_id = #{item.location_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, year, month, store_id, inv_id, end_amount, end_money, end_sale_money, begin_amount, begin_money, begin_sale_money, in_amount, in_money, in_sale_money, out_amount, out_money, out_sale_money, y_in_amount, y_in_money, y_in_sale_money, y_out_amount, y_out_money, y_out_sale_money, remove_zero_error, sale_zero_error, location_id FROM mat_inv_balance WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and store_id = #{store_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and inv_id = #{inv_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and location_id = #{location_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
